message.content:
1. Routine cranial CT scans were performed immediately after surgery.
2. The same CT scans were performed 24 hours after the completion of surgery.
3. The CT scans were rated without knowledge of the therapy arm.
4. There were two instances of CT scans, referred to as CT1 and CT2.
5. CT1 refers to the immediate post-surgery scan.
6. CT2 refers to the scan performed 24 hours after surgery.

messages.content:
Statement: Routine cranial CT scans were performed immediately (CT1) and 24 hours (CT2) after completion of surgery and were rated without knowledge of the therapy arm.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
